enhanced_description: Enparadigm provides a world-class Experiential Learning & Talent Intelligence platform, leveraging Generative AI and Immersive AI solutions to create hyper-personalised, immersive experiences. These solutions are designed to drive business impact and behavioural change across all employee levels and functions. The platform employs proprietary simulations and a rigorous sustained-learning approach to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency. Key offerings include Catalyx, a Talent Intelligence & Experiential Learning Platform for profiling, assessing, and developing employee competencies for future role-fit; Compass, which facilitates hybrid learning journeys and talent development programs through simulation-driven blended learning methodologies; and Confluence, a business simulations platform to prepare teams for real-world business challenges in a safe digital environment. Enparadigm specializes in areas such as business acumen, sales-force development, and leadership development, aiming to craft talent for the Future of Work. The company has been recognized by Deloitte among the fastest growing tech companies in APAC.
